鶮字的基本解释

鶮
hè
古同“鹤”。

鶮
hú
古邑名。

鶮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hè］
同“鶴1”。
[②]［hú］［gāo］
［《集韻》胡沃切，入，匣。］
古地名。

鶮字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶮； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1496第03
【正字通】與鶴同。又【集韻】胡沃切，音鵠。邑名。【史記·秦始皇紀】八年，遷其民於臨洮，卒屯留蒲鶮反。【註】蒲鶮，二邑。反，反卒也。正義曰：鶮音高。

鶮字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鶮字的起名意思

暂无。

鶮

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hè］
Same as "Crane 1".
[②]［hú］［gāo］
["Ji Yun" Hu Woqie, enter , box. ]
Ancient place names.
鶮
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鶮; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1496 No. 03
【Zhengzitong】Same as crane. Also 【Jiyun】Hu Woqie, Yinhu. The name of the town. 【Historical Records·Qin Shihuangji】In eight years, he moved his people to Lintao, and his soldiers stayed in Pudao. [Note] Pu Qi, Eryi. On the contrary, anti-pawn too. The justice said: 鶮 pitch.
